org.lightningj.paywall.springboot2

Class Poc1RestController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lightningj.paywall.springboot2.Poc1RestController

  • @RestController
public class Poc1RestController
extends java.lang.Object
    Proof of Concept REST controller with @PaymentRequired Mappings on method level. Used in various Integration and Functional Test

      • poc1

        @PaymentRequired(articleId="abc123")
 @RequestMapping(value="/poc1")
public PocResult poc1(@RequestParam(value="name",defaultValue="Poc1")
                                                                                           java.lang.String name)
        REST Endpoint that has a non pay per request PaymentRequired annotation.
        Parameters:
        name - value returned in generated string response.
        Returns:
        json object with call counter and string 'PocService1, 'name''

      • poc1PayPerRequest

        @PaymentRequired(articleId="abcPayPerRequest",
                 payPerRequest=true)
 @RequestMapping(value="/poc1PayPerRequest")
public PocResult poc1PayPerRequest()
        REST Endpoint that has a pay per request PaymentRequired annotation.
        Returns:
        json object with call counter and string 'PocService1, Pay Per Request'

      • poc1NoPaymentRequired

        @RequestMapping(value="/poc1NoPaymentRequired")
public PocResult poc1NoPaymentRequired()
        REST Endpoint that has no PaymentRequired annotation.
        Returns:
        json object with call counter and string 'PocService1, No Payment Required'

      • poc1APIError

        @PaymentRequired(articleId="abcPayPerRequest",
                 payPerRequest=true)
 @RequestMapping(value="/poc1ApiError")
public PocResult poc1APIError()
                                                                                                                                                   throws java.io.IOException
        REST Endpoint that generates an IOException, behind a paywall
        Returns:
        json object with spring standard JSON Error
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on each call to test internal problems
